name: Formulator Sample Shop - FSS Ceramide Complex
description: Formulator Sample Shop offers FSS Ceramide Complex, a concentrated mix of different ceramides, cholesterol, free fatty acids, and phytosphingosine. This complete barrier repair system is ideal for personal care products, providing comprehensive lipid support in small quantities suitable for R&D and small-batch production.
notes: FSS brand ensures tested and quality-controlled ingredients. Concentrated mix includes multiple ceramide types plus cholesterol, free fatty acids, and phytosphingosine. Ideal for formulators needing small quantities for testing and development.
